title: Make the Zone (Uruguay departments) dropdown scrollable so all 19 departments are accessible

requirements.text: Update the Zone select dropdown in `frontend/src/components/DiscoverFilters.tsx` so the departments list is vertically scrollable and all 19 Uruguay departments can be reached on typical mobile viewport sizes.

quotes: npo se llegan a ver los 19 departamentos, necesito que se pueda scrollear para verlos todos

acceptanceCriteria: Opening the Zone dropdown shows a scrollable list when the options exceed the available vertical space.
All items in `URUGUAY_DEPARTMENTS` plus the `ALL_DEPARTMENTS` option can be reached via scrolling and selected.
Scrolling works with mouse wheel/trackpad on desktop and touch scrolling on mobile.
No layout regressions to the Minimum/Maximum Category selects in the same sheet.

constraints: Do not modify any files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (read-only UI components must be composed, not edited).
Keep the backend unchanged; this is a UI-only fix.
nonGoals: Adding new departments or changing the department names/order in `frontend/src/utils/uruguayDepartments.ts`.
Implementing server-side filtering logic based on the selected Zone.
